mean_cn: n.泳池，水塘；  v.集中资源（或材料）
mean_en: [countable] a small area of still water, especially one that has formed naturally freshwater pools; a small amount of liquid or light lying on a surface; a group of people available for work when needed; a supply of things or money that is shared by a group of people and can be used when needed;
sentence: There is a big swimming pool in the park.
sentence_trans: 公园里有个超大的游泳池。
